content.detailedDescription: My girl friend and i, were camping outside the town of snowflake not sure if itwas coconino off of a logging road we found, off the main highway to snowflake.We had just finished eating camping out and was just getting dark and wassitting under a pine tree, when i noticed the ground around me eluminating. ilooked up...And noticed a light that, i thought may have been a big star atfirst...Almost straight above me, it started moving down towards me and my girlfriend who i thought was sleeping on my lap. as it got what appeared tobe....4-6ft. away, i realized what i was wittnesing was something from out ofthis world we live in. i became frozen like, with tingeling on the back of myneck and back, my breathing became aratic, i tried to touch it with the end ofmy rifle butt. the object must of been higher, hard to predict. at the closestpoint...It looked to be, what i would describe as a ball of energy which seemedto be anolizing us it definately was zerod in on us for some reason at whatseemed 4-5 ft. away. after a period of maybe a minute or two it started back upslowly then kind of...Dissapated from what iremember. it definately did not take off....Or make like an object that had aflight path or something. i didnt realy start getting scared until...Mygirlfriend started grabbing me and wispering what the hell is that then i knew iwasnt exaggerating please help me understand. steven paulson
content.summary: A bright ball of light

content.detailedDescription: Hello mufon i was taking my trash out at about 1000 pm when what i thought was alowflying jet came into view coming towards me out of the north. what attractedme to this lowflyer was the unusual number of lights. i watched until it reachedmy position and i had a side view.I thought that if this is a jet, there arelights running from nose to tail under the fuselage. same thing with wing tips.Lights all the way across. so i was seeing a cross formation of lights. theceiling was low that evening, im guessing around 500 feet. and this jet wasright at the ceiling. kind of flying in a fog up there. i distinguished no bodyshape at all. just the light pattern.What really got my attention was the factthat i didnt hear the scream of jet engines. just a swoosh sound. like if youwere to shush someone.Shhhhhhhhhhvery quiet indeed. the reason i am reportingthis is because two nights later i hear from a friend at work the wjw tv, foxaffiliate in cleveland, reported on their news channel that there were uforeports out of akron.I didnt see the reports and i dont want to talk to the newschannel but i am curious if what i saw is what was reported. it flew southacross interstate 76 and bypassed akron muninciple airport. to sum it up, youcould say i seen a low flying jet that was going very slow, very quiet, and hadlights galore. there were was one light lower than the rest, like the landinggear was down and there was a light only on one landing gear. as the set oflights approached my position, this is what i seen                      as it got beside my location for a sideview, this is what i seen           then it simply flew out of my view perspective....Total viewing time 3-4 minutes
content.summary: Low flyer

content.detailedDescription: I was a passenger in a car, when my father and i noticed a very brightwhiteyellowish sphere like object with a green light and small trail behind it. it dropped strait down into a forested area.  the object seemed to be a fewmiles away.  my father and i agreed it looked like a meteor or shooting star,but it did not cross the sky- it shot strait down.  we also agreed we have neverseen anything like that before. it was a semi-foggy evening and the light seemedto halo and surround the object.  the green light extinquished, right after iobsverved it. it certainly gave us something to talk about on the way home.
content.summary: Bright meteor like light shoots strait towards the

content.detailedDescription: Was driving south on hwy 85 near just before homestead sunnyvalecupertino.  itwas about 530pm thursday 11202003.  there was a huge bright ball of mostly whitelight falling from the sky, with a fat tail. this lasted for about 4-5 seconds. many people called into kgo radio about.  my friend who was also driving thesame route saw it as well.  he lives in loma prieta and as seen the lenoids lastyear and told me this really looked man made.  it was huge  looked like it wasfalling onto the hills of saratoga.  i called around and the only info i wasable to get was from the san jose mercury news.  they said it was a missile testby edwards airforce base.  although the in not confirmed. im curious to find outif it was a missile test.
content.summary: Big ball of light falling from the sky meteor or m

content.detailedDescription: I was driving home from logansport, indiana after seeing a girl friend. it wasabout 9 pm or a little after. i was about half way between idaville and burnstville near the old sawmill and saw a formation like ducks fly in v formation with about 7 or 8 lights  off to the south west coming torward me not directly at me but off the south of me. i stop the pickup and got out side and looked for a few seconds. i remembered i had a polaroid land camera with me.  i had taken pictures of my girl friend i got the camera and took a photo. my handswere shaking so bad i couldn't keep the camera still. i laid the photo on the hood of the truck and took another photo. laid that photo on the truck hood, the wind pickuped a little and the photos started to be blown off the hood  a car had passed by me on the highway so i turned to catch them then turned around again and the formation of lights had scattered in a split second, now all the lights were scattered all around the horizon. and were moving in different directions and had moved a great distance in under a second. i got the pictures and got back in the truck went on home in monticello. i looked at the photos when i got home i don't remember if they turned out or if i can even round up the photos any more.
content.summary: Saw a formation of lights in the night sky

content.detailedDescription: I was driving home from dinner at my mother in laws. saw object when stopped ata light, didnt think anything strange about it thought it was an airplane, wehave an airport nearbye. when i got home it was still in sight, and then i got agood look at it, it had two stationary white lights on each end, could not tellthe shape, and in the middle were all different color lights. it just seemed tohover as it moved. no sound. i dont know if it was a blimp or not, but it suredidnt have lights like one. i just wanted to report it cause i couldnt make outwhat it was, maybe some other people saw it to who were closer. it just movedaway on an eastern route, went into the trees on the horizen. if i didnt have mykids in the car i would have chased it. but with the kids i just decided towatch from afar. well thats that, just wanted to report it, thanks for yourtime.   mike
content.summary: Ufo over long island ny

content.detailedDescription: Riding back from new orleans on i-10 on the bridge i was staring at sky noticing the stars and how clear the sky was when one of the stars i was staring at got real bright white then blinked red then flew around in a sporadic pattern similar to a fly, then it blinked out completely. the person driving asked what i was looking at as soon as i said i didn't know he saw it. we continued on i-10 past slidell, la and as we discussed what we saw i noticed an empty car on the side of the road. i started counting cars there seemed to be quite a few empty cars along the interstate, i counted seven. i felt strange then looked up out the front winshield and saw what looked like two round solid dark objects, very symetrical coming toward the car just above the treeline. the objects had a thin halo and what i can only describe as an atmospheric disturbance. it was smoke-like but it was not smoke. i reached for the drivers arm because i could not speak, but i wanted to know if he saw it too. as soon as i touched his arm he screamed so i knew he saw it also. we continued to head for home as fast as we could.
content.summary: Craft flew low above car strange lights in distanc

content.detailedDescription: Around 1:30 on oct 25th i stepped out on the porch to get a breath of fresh air. i saw three lights in a line approx 30-40 ft over a treeline about 34 of a mileaway. actual footage cannot be calculated because there wasn't an accurate third point for triangulation. i called for both my wife and son to come out to see it. the three of us viewed the objects for about 5 min before all three lights began to tilt and raise slightly. the right light highest cut off shortly followed by the other two in unison as the light cluster began to take off. we waited to see if the sillouette would go over us but the objects must have taken a different flight path. north easternly path @ 15-40 degree notes. no noise. perfectly motionless hover. estimated distance from outside light to outside light- 300-450 wide again no third point for size triangulation. the area over which the object hovered is a large patch of woods located in the middle of a medium sized city.
content.summary: Saw 3 hovering lights  connected

content.detailedDescription: We were all standing by a fire we had just made. some of us were watching thesky because of the recent leonid meteor shower occuring. we then noticed a verybright object moving faster than the usual craft in we see. the ufo begane moveeraticaly in a zig zag motion. then continued in a north direction. the whitecolor went to a bright orange to a bright red then blinked and disappeared. thesky was clowdless and with high visibility. this lasted approx. 5min. thanks foryour help./// experiment
content.summary: Very bright ufo moving in eraticaly

content.detailedDescription: the date  i gave is accurate to within a day or two.  i wanted to clarify     that first.  i live in a very rural area with only a few houses nearby. the     closest house is 300 yards or so to the east. the other houses are to the     north starting at about the same distance of 300 or so yards, and     consistantly spaced as i said to the north for about 1.5 miles.  to the     west there a few houses, the nearest being 1 mile away.  to the south there     is nothing but open pasture or praire with many revenes, gradual hills and     dry creeks.  i guess the nearest house to the south is probably 8 miles as     the crow flies, and not at all visible, with the hilly countour of the     land, from my house. in esscence it is desolate back there and dark at     night.I was home alone the night that we are speaking of and i had eaten some dinnerand layed down on the couch to watch some t.V., as my dogs, all four of them,crashed out on the floor next to me. i dozed off at about 1030 p.M. or so, andawoke shortly after and turned the t.V. off and fell right back to sleep. allfour dogs were sound asleep on the floor in the living room beside me.Some time later, around 130 a.M., i was awakened by my dogs making a few whinysounding short barks and scurrying around the living room.  i thought that theymight need to go outside to relieve their bladders, so i got up and put on myshoes to take them outside.  i stood up and before i could even take one step,all of the dogs ran around the couch and into my room hiding in the closet amdbehind my bed as they do when it storms or is very windy. i started to followthem down the hall to my room when i noticed to my left out the front door, adim blue haze coming from the south.  i grabbed my binoculars not knowing whatwould be causing the light as there are no houses or roads of any kind to thesouth, from which the light was being projected.  i opened the fron
content.summary: Pulsating, blue- haloed sphere

content.detailedDescription: It was approx 1979, as i remember that i was only about 5 because i hadnt asthen started school.  me and my family were on holidays at the gold coastaustralia and standing in a take away food store waiting for our order.  beingfrom a country town, i was amazed by jumbo jets that would frequently fly overhead.  every time i would hear a jet flying over, i would run out onto thefootpath and look at it flying over.I did this for a while, hearing the jet sound and running out to look at it. then after about the 3rd jet, i heard what i assumed was to be another jet, butwas amazed to see a disc floating just above the road while traffic still drovepast.  this was on a very busy road, so i am sure there must have been otherwitnesses.  what amazed me was that it was just hovering right there over theroad no more than 20ft and almost directly above me.  i was in shock and didntthink to yell out to everyone in the shop to come out and look.One thing i noticed that, even at that young age struck me as peculiar was themulti-coloured lights all around the craft.  they appeared to be standard screwin type incandescent globes we are all familiar with.  i remember thinking wow,they use the same types of lights as us.This very fact has led many to tell me that i must have been mistaken that itwasnt a ufo, that it was a helicopter or something similar.  i know what i sawand it wasnt a helicopter or anything similar.I could see inside through the windows in the top of the craft and it was verybright white.  like it may be lit by flourescent lighting in a perfect whiteroom.  i could not see any inhabitants in the craft.Perhaps it was because i was so young, i dont know, but i did not feel any fear. i was in awe and shocked, but very calm.Probably the strangest thing that i remember about the whole incident, andsometimes disturbs me, is that it made absolutely no sound whatsoever as itgently drifted out of sight over the pacific ocean.  it is odd because it madethe sound of a jet on its arrival, and no sound leaving.  it was like theywanted me to come out and see them.  it is like they knew that i was coming outwhen a jet noise appeared.As it neared the horizon on its departure, i ran into the shop telling everyoneto quicky come outside to see the ufo.  it was long gone and i felt quiteembarrased.Ps, i was forced to pu
content.summary: A long time ago i saw a ufo up close.

content.detailedDescription: I was at work. i went outside and looked up. i saw what looked like a brightstar that did not move.  it was broad daylight and there were no clouds.  ilooked at it for about one minute. it seemed to not move, and had a small arrowlike device coming from the back. i looked away for a moment and when i lookedup again it was gone.  it did not come back.
content.summary: Sighting of 112003

content.detailedDescription: Exiting work on casmir pulaski dr. heading east. i waited at the light on rt. 43heading east and looked up and across the road. above the horizon i saw whatappeared to be a aerial holding pattern as seen from a distance. looked exactlylike planes waiting outside ohare in inclement weather, waiting for anopportunity to land, except they were very low. we do have an airport here and amilitary base, but it is a naval base great lakes and a training facility forbasic. the light changed and i continued east keeping an eye on the lights. ibelieve that they appeared to be either over abbot labs or just east of it which would be over the near western shore of lake michigan. when i reachedlewis rd. i noticed that the 6-10 lights had become, quite suddenly, 4 seperateand very distinct lights. they appeared to be moving slowly eastward and downsimultaneously toward the horizon. by the time i reached sheridan road in frontof abbot labs., i could only see one and that one disappeared from my line ofsight as i turned north.They looked like very bright stars at first, much like venus did recently,though much larger. they at first appeared to be very distant, as if in aholding pattern viewed from afar. i realized they were not far and i noticedthey were moving eastward at a rate somewhat faster than 30 mph i was traveling.They could have been helicopters i guess though they did not move with the quickmotions of a helicopter ascending or descending. and i could not describe themethod in which they left my field of view as it seemed that they descended andfaded at the same time.
content.summary: Saw string of lights

content.detailedDescription: We were at a beach adjacent to the atlantic ocean near a beachcalled martinique beach about 30 miles from halifaxdartmouth.We felt a presence and looked up and there it was.I did not know what this object was. no noise. all blue like a sparklingdiamond.Kim saw it first. then i looked and saw it also. i looked at it for about30 seconds then went to get my binoculars. as i tried to look in withmy binoculars it left just disappeared..It stood there hovering in silent and looking brilliant quite differentnever seen this type of color in my life. it was just beautiful to look at.It did not hurt the eyes. you could feel amazement while looking at it.It was the most beautiful thing i have ever seen.. it was very smooth of abluish color and looked more like a sparkling diamont in the shape of a teardropbut on its side.Kim kept looking at it. i went to reach for my binoculars and it justdisapeared.Shortly afterwards a what seemed to be an air force jet whizzed by..About
content.summary: A shining blue scintillating like a diamond above

content.detailedDescription: It was 900pm i was going to get oil for stove, on the way back inoticed atriangle shaped object it had red blue an whiteyellow lights just sitting in thesky i pulled to the side of the road an looked it wasnt moving flashing ornothing so i pulled my blazer facing the object an started flashing my lights atit,. at first nothing happened but after a minute or two it started pulsingbritely,so i started up an drove twoard it,there was a field on my left so ipulled down to it as i walked in to it i saw a lightblue light in the field nextto me but at that same time it went out.So i looked up at the object i startedstriking my lighter because the field was dark,an i thought the object wouldnotice an so it did..An started moving closer to me at that same time a whiteobject apeared at the tree tops to my right for some reason i could not take myeyes off it i watched it til it went out of sight at that moment i turned tolook at the other object an it was right over my head an i was very scared so istarted getting out of the field as i left i noticed many objects an thayfollowed me ......I would very much like to tell the rest of what happened but iam not much of a typer an it takes me to long to type everything3e please...Contact me ive had numerus sightings an odd experiences.My emailaddress is lloverly2@yahoo.Com  please please contact me
content.summary: Seen red white an blue triangle

content.detailedDescription: I was driving north on i-29 on thursday, november 13, 2003.  at about 400 p. m.,midway between council bluffs and sioux city, i saw a network of high voltagepower lines that crossed the interstate up ahead.  above the power line network,i saw an object that i first assumed was a dark, tobaccobronzebrown jet planethat had just taken off and was climbing to gain altitude. since i was, atleast, thirty or forty miles north of council bluffs and eppley field in omaha,and out in the middle of flat, farm country, i was surprised to see the planeand wondered where it had come from.After driving under the power line network, i began watching the object throughthe front windshield of my car. i was waiting for it to continue climbing andorbank right or left, so that i could see its wing structure and identify theaircraft. it appeared to be less than a mile from my car.  but, as i continuedto drive and watch the object, it remained stationary -- tilted at about a 40degree angle in the sky.  the craft was narrow and elongated, with no wings,props, landing gear, windows, jet wash, or other distinquishing marks, exceptfor a slight bump on each end.I had driven quite a way, watching this object and wondering what it was, when acar passed me at a very high speed on my left.  i immediately looked over at thecar, and checked my position on the highway.  when the car was safely past me,and i looked back up at the object in the sky, i was amazed to see nothing but alarge, intensely-black circle, where the original craft had been.  to myastonishment, the circle quickly diminished in size to approximately one half ofits original diameter, and then completely disappeared   in the few seconds thati glanced away from the craft, it apparently turned up on its side i. e., towhere i was actually seeing the circular bottom of the craft before it eithercloaked itself, or took off at a velocity that apparently exceeded the speed oflight.Needless to say, i was and remain stunned and dumbfounded by what i witnessed. iam a rational 60-year-old, scientifically trained, and not subject tohallucinations.  but i can offer no reasonable explanation for the craft that isaw.  please let me know if there were other reports of a similar craft inwestern iowa on that day, or if other observers have ever seen similar objectsthat simply disappeared.  i would be pleased to talk with any of yourresearchers about this matter.  thank you for your consideration.
content.summary: A ufo that changed shape and disappeared

content.detailedDescription: Hi my name is william haddox and i would like to report a ufo sightingit happened at hargus lake the night of the total lunar eclipes.It was a small amber color dot in the sky at first i though it was anairplane but it went in reverse and side to side then it hovered for afew minutes the took off very fast but not in a stright line more of in and outthan a straight line
content.summary: Small amber color light

content.detailedDescription: I was flying a small private aircraft about 30nm south of memphis. it was about 3:00pm, clear weather, unlimited visibility. my passenger was a customer of mine who is now deceased. we were at 3000agl in level flight, smooth air. i saw a bright light to the ne, moving at a 45 degree to my flight path toward the sw. it passed in front and below us. it was close, real close. it was round and metallic, speed about 600mph plus. when it was at a 45 degree off my left wing, behind me to the sw, it vanished. one second it was there then it wasn't. someone from mufon talked to me about it a few days later. i also had a dream that night. in the dream i was inside the craft. there were three beings with me. they had big heads and large eyes. i was at the controls as one of them was trying to teach me how to fly it. i said to him her, i can't fly this thing. he/she said, yes you can it's easy. we were thinking to each other, not talking with sound.
content.summary: Round, metallic, object, seen by pilot

content.detailedDescription: I stepped outside for a cigarette at 430am while breakfast was cooking,preparingto go to work. the sky was crystal clear so i began observing orion @ about 85degrees up in the central western region. suddenly a bright star appeared inorion and traveled north at a speed that covered half the distance to thehorizon in about 25 seconds. i thought it may have been a low orbit satellitebut suddenly another star appeared in orion on the same course as the first andappeared to be chasing the original star. by now the first star was two thirdsof the way to the horizon when the second star caught up to it in about 5seconds. it came very close and then veered northwest and was gone 3 secondslater. 5 seconds later the original star  vanished. as a commercial helicopterpilot my guess at the altitude of these two objects was well over 50,000 feet.The stars never blinked and neither did i.
content.summary: Seriously fast

content.detailedDescription: It was 510 am. i was taking my dog out and happened to notice a bright light tothe south. it was still dark out at this time and the skies were totallyclear.At first i thought it was a plane but as it moved accross the sky i didntnotice any blinking lights common to aircraft. also there are no flight paths inthat route. i know this because i watch the sky constantly. there was noapparent noise i could hear. it was some distance from me so that may be why. idecided to get my sony mini-cam and record some of it. to my astonishment when izoomed in on the object i saw three bright white lights in a triangle formation.I taped tbe object for about thirty seconds before my battery went dead. iwatched it disapear over some rooftops. after watching the tape a dozen times iswear i can see the faint outline of a triangle.I need help getting thisconverted to digital format so it can be examined more thorough.
content.summary: Possible triangle caught on tape.

content.detailedDescription: On the night of november 10, 2003 at around 1130 p.M. my dog, puffers, startedto shimmy around in my apartment on the floor, whining and being very strange. usually when she even makes a slight movement she has to go to the bathroom. this is the first time in a long time that she actually did this sort ofbehavior this late at night.  i work mon-fri starting a 7am so i am usually inbed by 930 or 1000 pm.  i do not feed her water or food after six so that shedoes not need to go out past 900pm.  well i got out of bed and let her out.  shebolted to the backyard of my apartment.  my backyard is a enbankment over astream that leads to the neshannock crick.  on the other side of the enbankmentis a large area of woods.  i let her go onto the grassy area and she startedsniffing around.  mind you, she never, never goes near the water ever.  i lit upa cigarette and was looking at the sky for not even a minute.  i drifted backdown to puffers and she was slowly walking toward the stream.  i started toscream out of fear that she would fall in the water and at that moment i heard arustle in the woods associated with a very annoying humming noise.  i started tolook into the woods and saw a white light about 10 feet from the tree tops.  ithought it was just a distant car light or business light so i quickly dismissedit as being anything unordinary and called for my dog.  at that moment puffersstarted to bark and yelp like someone was stepping on her tail.  i got scaredthinking she stepped on something and hurt her paw.  when i went to pick her up,she threw herself out of my arms and started bolting down the enbankment towardthe stream again.  i started running after her and happened to see out of thecorner of my eye this same light i thought was nothing start rising out of thewoods.  i stopped dead in my tracks with fear that i was about to experience aparanormal experience.  i looked down at my feet and puffers was sitting verynice just staring at this light that had obviously gotten the best of both ofour attentions.  as i looked at this tear-dropped shaped light i noticed that itwas almost like blinking but with a very slow motion.  it was like a dirty whitecolor and as it kept rising until it was directly aligned with the treetops inoticed
content.summary: Western pennsylvania sighting

content.detailedDescription: At about the time of the incident, i was just watching a little t.V. beforeturning in for the night.  as i was doing so, the screen started to flicker, andthe lights dimmed a little.  curious as to what happened, i got up and examinedthe light switch.  as i was fiddling with the switch, i heard a faint hummingsound that was growing louder every second.  i stepped to the windor and glancedout beyond my neighbors house at the forest just past.  hovering just about thetreeline was an orange, star-shaped object.  it was just approximatly passingover the forest when it stopped.  its color changed to a more reddish tint as awhite beam dropped out of the bottom into the forest.  this only lasted for afew seconds, followed by the object retracting the beam and then justdisappearing into thin air.
content.summary: Saw strange orange light

content.detailedDescription: We were entering the highway i-575n from earnest barrett parkway. i passengerwas just looking around, and happened to look to the right. at the top of thehill parallel to us bells ferry rd. and earnest barrett pkwy, i noticed that alarge metallic object was hovering in the sky about 300 feet above the ground. iasked my husband driver to look as well. we both saw this object and observedthat it was not moving at all. it did not look like a plane or a blimp or aballoon of any kind--we didnt know what to make of it. we were forced to proceedonto the highway and our view of the object became obstructed. we exited thehighway at bells ferry rd. and turned right east to go back in the directionwhere we saw the object. when we arrived at the intersection of bells ferry rd.And earnest barrett pkwy, the object was no longer there or visible--whichever.We have no idea what it was the weather was calm, no wind. the sky was brightblue and there were several puffy white clouds in the sky. other than that, itwas perfectly clear and about 70 degrees--a beautiful day
content.summary: Hovering silver object

content.detailedDescription: The children were outside playing when they looked up in the southeastern skyand observed the object which most likely was a glowing blimp, but to children,it was something else.  my grandaughter being one of the children 8yrs oldandvery smart and observant described a saucer like vehicle with a dome on top. however, it would be nice for all concerned, to find out what really flew overthat area on this day and approximate time.
content.summary: Green and glowing object.

content.detailedDescription: Sunday, nov 9th, 2003 i was driving thru charlotte nc and on my way out of town,when three triangle shaped objects crossed my path in the sky at about a a 45degree angle from the middle of the road over to the left side of the road andcrossed  over to my left shoulder and disappeared beyond the trees there. thelady seated in my car with me also saw the event and we commented on ittogether. it was hard to tell the exact distance and size of the objects. theyappeared to have louvers across them on all three triangles. one flew separatelyand one appeared attatched to the other flying in a tip to blunt end formation.I could not assertain the size or distance due to the objects being outside myrealm of understanding. we continued to look, but never saw the objects again.
content.summary: 3 triangles 2 attatched and 1 single all with louv

content.detailedDescription: When we return to our sleeping bag for begin to sleep, we sawacross the sky , an ufo, like rocket, acroos to west to eastit was like a pipe , with a light involve the pipe, maybe somepeople call foofighther, i think so, the light are gold, a green,but more or less we saw for a 2 or 3 minutes across the sky, it wasvery espectacular, and i excited me because it was amazing.Greetings froom monterrey , mexicocristobal acosta,i hope your coments about my experience
content.summary: The  ufo fly over montesur, monterrey, mexico

content.detailedDescription: I was observing the 119 lunar eclipse using a 8in dob. i was using a sonydigital cam to take photos. i happened to notice that in the series of photos, ihad captured a small red star-like dot which first appears on the lunar horizon,and then moved several degrees across the face of the moon and slightly north. ablow up of the object from several shots reveals the same structure. somethinglike two red donuts stuck together. i suppose some people may say its anartifact caused by the camera, but i doubt an artifact would look like donuts. ishould add i have just completed my grad diploma in astronomy and am somewhatfamiliar with the subject of tlps.
content.summary: Possible tlp seen during lunar eclipse

content.detailedDescription: i had entered the freeway from the lombard  st. exit going due south... immediatly upon merging onto the freeway i looked up into the sky above  to the south east .. all the cars had slowed way down by this time.. to see  a   of silver military jets flying very irradically.. at first i thought with my peripheral vision that they were birds by the way they were flying weaving  back and forth.. thats what made me look up i then  saw that the 2 jets were chasing a bright reflective object... the jets were trying to surround the object and keep it between them,, thats how it appeared to me. the whole highway obviously saw this too.  jets around portland do not fly the daredevil way that these jets were flying.. they were also not as high as any plane would be at all flying over the city. especially over the highway the traffic was stopped and puttering along for 7 minutes.. i watched as much as i could of the flying jets  and the bright object they were chasing, and maybe saw 2 min. worth and then the traffic jam.. all lanes were still... i have never seen anything like this in broad day light before.  very surreal.. i felt bewildered and have been very amped up all the rest of the afternoon because of it.. i hope i can sleep tonight.. i am really wondering if anyone else has reported this as well. i didnt know where else to report this to.. so thanks for being here.. i also thought that if it were reported we sure wouldnt hear about it on the evening news.Thanks, jen
content.summary: Hwy  i-5  southbound  portland or.

content.detailedDescription: I richard carpenter was fishing with 15 are so people at 1230 at night along the river when we saw the objust hover above us,coming from1-270 coming in that way with no lights on at the time, you can seen it easly,why , because it cuase the stars as it was coming to us, a large objust about300 feet circle with a few rod poping out it at diff. ends.Then a few smalllight came on blue ,white and a few browns.Were you can see most of the bottomsome people began to be frighten, a few ran to cars an left, but later no poliecame, wonder whyyou can see most o the bottom of the craft, alot of objust wereprotruding around it box type, anntas , a few micerwave like things, and otherunknon things.We were alstill at watch it but was not afraid to much,, we saidtoeveryone, that we never hear anyone die seeing them why we stick around andwatch, maybe say hello , one man say we matbe abducted, spooky wow.But it seemcalm look we just hunging aroung for a light show, boy did we get on
content.summary: Objust 350 feet above water 100 feet no sound, are
content.locationName: Chautea island low water, South Carolina

content.detailedDescription: We were building a clubhouse at a dirt clearing near a wooded area. it was darkoutside with clear skies. we were about to nail down the last piece of the roof,when i saw a briliant white light behind us from the corner of my eye. i turnedaround saw this object,then grabed my friend and turned him around and showedhim. he instantly became transfixed on the oject and became unresponsive. i didnot know what it was, but it flew like nothing i ever saw before or since.  myreaction was intrigue and fear.  my partner did not have any reaction until itleft, then he was overcome by fear.  our final reaction was to run away.  itshull blended perfectly with the nights sky. it had a brilliant white lightcoming from its entire bottom.  the light coming from the bottom, lit up theimmediate surroundings like if it was daylight. when the object was moving itseemed like it had a long green light on the back of it. the green light wasglowing but not as bright as the white light under it.  the object came down ata steady pace until it came to a hover approximately 18-20 feet from the ground,40-50 feet directly in front of us.  it stayed in that exact position for approx30 seconds. it did not make any sound or stir up any dirt or debris.  then itstarted to rise and move toward the tree line to our right. it moved over thetree line into the woods and did what i would call a u-turn and headed backtowards us again. approximately 30 seconds after going over the tree line itcame back to a hover at the exact place it hovered before.  then after hoveringfor about 15-20 seconds it started to rise and move towards our left which wassouth. it continued to rise until its white light blended with the stars, thenwent out of sight. it maintained a slow steady pace during all these movements.Maybe 5 miles per hour when maneuvering in front of us increasing the speedduring its departure. this is not a joke
content.summary: Saw object hovering within a rocks throw.
